name: QuantCopy
description: Sales is all about personalization, but it is impossible to keep up with all of your customers. Every day, you drown in information. You miss out on opportunities to connect with key customers. We automate prospect research, campaign personalization, and top-of-funnel optimization for technology companies. Brought to you by a unique team of high frequency traders and experimental physicists. Email rudy@quantcopy.com today.

team.title: Chief Revenue Officer
team.name: Rudy Lai
team.bioHtml: Founder @QuantCopy. Speaker @Indie Hackers . Deep Learning @OReilly. Ex-GM Commodities E-Trading @BAML @Morgan Stanley CS @Imperial College London

jobs.title: Salesperson
jobs.description:
Hey there,

I am Rudy, a technical founder, looking for a sales expert to come shape the future of B2B sales development at QuantCopy. 

Prior B2B sales development/SDR experience is important, but passion about how to improve the way we sell is crucial. When we successfully automate top-of-funnel, sales is going to look very different.

You will initially spend time delivering Sales-as-a-Service, with the help of our software. Our software owns the decisions on what to say to a lead, and when to say it, and your role is to configure and steer the bot to deliver conversions to our clients. So, using your expertise to build sales bots for each of our clients. 

You will manually fill functionality gaps, while working with product and engineering to automate the work.

Looking forward to speaking with you! :)
